reviews.review_msg: (EASC210) As accurately described in a previous review, Shahin is definitely a "loose canon." He's soft-spoken and chilling one moment, then making a passive aggressive comment about the class the next. Not very approachable, as he quips back rudely at students at times if you ask the "wrong" question. Not a hard class, but could be taught better.
Insults students during lectures for the tiniest things, also his breath smells disgusting you have to sit at the back of the class to avoid feeling sick during lecture

DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASSES!!!! there is a reason his rating is so low. he puts concepts on exams that were NOT covered in class, when students ask for clarification he BLAMES us and makes it out to be our fault (the info was nowhere in the lectures, videos, or syllabus, so its not a matter of "we didnt study enough" he didn't give us the information.
Got the highest grade in the class..... If Shahin is teaching, take the course another year.

Very monotonous. Likes to talk a lot, but has trouble conveying course material effectively. Depending on the profs mood may react in an oddly aggressive manner or be calm (bit of a loose canon). I would not recommend this prof.
